atlassian.config_file_template:
export JIRA_BASE_URL="https://your-company.atlassian.net"
export CONFLUENCE_URL="https://your-company.atlassian.net/wiki"
export JIRA_EMAIL="your.email@your-company.com"
export JIRA_API_TOKEN="your-api-token-here"
setup_steps: 4. Test with prompt: 'load credentials from ~/.atlassian_config and authenticate'
example_prompts: load credentials from C:\Users\{username}\.atlassian_config and authenticate
create a bug ticket for authentication issue
show me all tickets assigned to me
create a confluence page for API documentation
